plot: A trilogy of 3 short and surreal, non-linear "stories" (used in the widest sense of the word, as they have no easily discernible plot) which explore the dynamism of constant birth and death...
title: Chui-si zao-wu ai-ge
plot_es: A trilogy of 3 short and surreal, non-linear "stories" (used in the widest sense of the word, as they have no easily discernible plot) which explore the dynamism of constant birth and death...
